com.groundcontrol.game.model

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groundcontrol.game.model.GameModel

  • public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
    MVC Model Simple class that only has the information relative to the position and so on of the game elements.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameModel()
      Default constructor Creates all the needed element model

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates the model in each step. Checks if the explosions are over, and if so removes them. Checks if the comets are out of bonds, and if so removes them.
        Parameters:
        delta - time elapsed after the last step
